description:
Recovering from a personal injury means much more than physical healing. At Malloy Law Offices, LLC, in Alexandria, Virginia, we recognize the emotional and financial aspects of incidents such as car accidents, medical malpractice and workplace injuries. We take a comprehensive approach to every case, fighting for compensation for clients' immediate needs as well as looking ahead to see what costs and obstacles may be on the horizon.

Taking this client-centered focus has resulted in our law firm returning more than $46 million to the people we serve. Our attorneys have a strong background in litigation and are prepared to go to trial to secure maximum compensation. At the same time, we recognize the importance of getting on the road to recovery quickly. Many of the awards we have obtained have come through our exceptional negotiation tactics.

The attorneys at our practice have earned a number of honors, including the following:

  • Listed in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best
  • Selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers
  • Listed in the Lawyers of Distinction
  • Named in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100

Malloy Law Offices, LLC, offers free initial consultations to prospective clients. We also have the ability to meet with clients in a virtual setting, such as over the phone or through the use of video conferencing. Our practice has four locations serving Maryland, Virginia and the Washington, D.C., areas. We can provide services in English, Spanish and Russian. Additionally, we only collect a fee if we win our client's case.
